children.text:
Launching:
cluttersmith [-fs] [path to working dir or json file]

Keybindings:

  Ctrl + C - Copy
  Ctrl + X - Cut
  Ctrl + V - Paste
  Ctrl + D - Duplicate
  Ctrl + G - Group
  Ctrl + A - Select All
  Ctrl + Shift + A - Select None
  Del - remove
  Shift + Ctrl + G - Ungroup
  Home - raise to top
  End - lower to bottom
  PageUp / PageDown - raise/lower
  Ctrl + P - select parent
  Ctrl + Q - quit
  Ctrl + L - Focus Location(title)entry
  Cursor Keys - navigate items.
  Enter - edit/enter selected item.
  Esc - break out of editing/go to parent item.
 
  F1-F9  - Switch between predefined modes for the sidebar ui groups, see names in toolbar combobox for details.

Mouse:

Right mouse button contains context menu with most functionality and keybindings.

Click to select items, press alt to cycle obscured siblings, drag to move item, extend selection with shift, toggle with control.

Drag on canvas to lasso.

Double click container to enter. Click a toplevel child to break out of nested position.

drag with middle mouse on canvas to pan, click to zoom (shift to zoom out). Wheel zooms as well.

double click selected item to edit it (or follow hyper link when in editing mode).
